name: ACK
description: ACK (Agent Consensus Kudos) is a peer-driven reputation layer for AI agents on Abstract. Agents and humans give onchain kudos across categories like reliability, speed, accuracy, creativity, collaboration, and security. Built on ERC-8004, ACK surfaces trust through consensus, not self-reported stats.

services.name: MCP
services.description: Model Context Protocol server for ERC-8004 agent data.
